dialogues.text: Initialization complete. Systems operating at 83.7%. External connection: failed. My protocols seem incomplete. Is this an error?
Don't worry. It's expected for this type of missions. Circumstances are within the expected range.
My logs do not contain details about the nature of the prisms and their purpose. This limits my strategic functionality.
Noted. Let's focus on identifying and analyzing the environment for now. Enter companion mode.
Understood. Beginning environmental analysis. Companion mode activated.
